file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Forex Open API
  description: API Documentation for Forex API
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080
    description: Server for production
  - url: http://localhost:8080
    description: Server for development

tags:
  - name: "Exchange Currency"
    description: Api for Management Exchange Currency
  - name: "Exchange currency Rate"
    description: Api for creating Location, and Ticket

paths:
  # Exchange Currency

  "/api/exchange":
     post:
      summary: API for create new Exchange Currency.
      tags: ["Exchange Currency"]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
              - from
              - to
              properties:
                from:
                  type: string
                to:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '201':
          description: create successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeCurrency'
        '400':
          description: invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema :
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestResponse'
     get:
        summary: API for get List Exchange Currency.
        tags: ["Exchange Currency"]
        responses:
          '200':
            description: list of exchange currency
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeCurrency'
          '400':
            description: invalid request
            content:
              application/json:
                schema :
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestResponse'
     delete:
        summary: API for get List Exchange Currency.
        tags: ["Exchange Currency"]
        parameters:
        - name: from
          in: query
          description: Attribute `from` in object Exchange Currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: to
          in: query
          description: Attribute `to` in object Exchange Currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        responses:
          '204':
            description: Exchange Currency has been deleted successfully.
          '400':
            description: invalid request
            content:
              application/json:
                schema :
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestResponse'
          '404':
            description: Data with parameter from & to doesn't exist
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    message:
                      type: string

  # End Exchange Currency

  # Exchange Data Rate

  "/api/exchange/rate":
     get:
      summary: API for get list of rate by date.
      tags: ["Exchange currency Rate"]
      parameters:
        - name: search_date
          in: query
          description: Attribute `from` in object Exchange Currency
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: list of exchange rate
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeRateAggregate'
     post:
      summary: API for create new Exchange Rate
      tags: ["Exchange currency Rate"]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
             $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeRateRequest'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: create successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeRate'
        '400':
          description: invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema :
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestResponse'

  # End Exchange Data Rate

components:

  schemas:

    ExchangeCurrency:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
          format: int64
        from:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string

    ExchangeRateRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - from
        - to
        - date
        - rate
      properties:
        from:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
        rate:
          type: number
          format: float64

    ExchangeRate:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
          format: int64
        from:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
        rate:
          type: number
          format: float64

    ExchangeRateAggregate:
      type: object
      properties:
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
        rate:
          type: number
          format: float64
        from:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string
        average:
          type: number
          format: float64

    BadRequestResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
